placeholderImages.description: A close-up shot of a car's odometer showing the mileage.
A clear photo of the vehicle's VIN sticker, usually found on the driver-side doorjamb.
A photo of the dashboard with the car running to show if any warning lights are on.
A photo of the entire front of the vehicle.
A photo of the entire back of the vehicle.
A photo of the entire driver's side of the vehicle.
A photo of the entire passenger's side of the vehicle.
A photo showing the condition of the front seats.
A photo showing the tread of one of the tires.
